snippet: The exhibition “Max Weber on Long Island,” at the Heckscher Museum in Huntington, has 26 of his landscapes on display, and many had been in storage since his death.
abstract: Exhibition entitled Max Weber on Long Island, at the Heckscher Museum in Huntington, has 26 of Weber's landscapes on display, many of which have been in storage since his death (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: The exhibition “Max Weber on Long Island,” at the Heckscher Museum in Huntington, has 26 of his landscapes on display, and many had been in storage since his death.

headline.seo: Max Weber’s Long Island Landscapes Are at the Heckscher Museum
